website_summaries.verdict: This thin, elegant showerhead provides quality at a very decent price.
pros: Easy to install, with no tools required
An expensive look at an affordable price
Offers high quality and an impressive water flow
Ships in a cloth bag to prevent scratching during shipping
cons: The middle nozzle shoots out water at a higher pressure, resulting in an uneven experience
Some reports of it splitting open a few months to a year down the road

customer_reviews.title: Works for a few months
customer_reviews.text: I wish that I had read the other reviews about the product lasting only months because that is exactly how long ours lasted; then, just have others have said, it rusted and the side split open. We had ours in a spare bathroom and only used the shower maybe a dozen times.
customer_reviews.author: Momma

customer_reviews.title: Terrific showerhead
customer_reviews.text: Our old shower head broke after 16 years and leaked all down the back of the wall. We needed a new shower head fast! This came within two days and more than exceeded my expectations. It is large. It is made of quality stainless steel and was very easy to install. Installed it with the AKDY 11" brass arm. What a great combination. It puts out so much water and yet doesn't get all over the floor. I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: One thing to note: the bigger the area of the rainfall shower head, the more water it will use.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use with the Fivanus Universal Showering Components Shower Head Arms. They work perfectly together. There are no drips. I finger tightened everything, no tools required. The shower head works perfectly and came with a few extra nipples. One thing to note: the bigger the area of the rainfall shower head, the more water it will use. We went through our hot water much faster than our old low flow shower head, so I bought a water shutoff adapter. I open the nozzle about half way and problem solved. For the whole set up, I spent about half of what a rainfall shower head would cost alone at a big box store.
customer_reviews.author: MrsB

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: At first, this was a great product. Installation wasn't too hard and it worked very well. Unfortunately, the shoddy assembly and sub par materials have become more evident as time has gone on - over the last few months, the nozzles stopped pointing straight, so the streams go all over the place. Then, a nozzle fell out, which made one stream 10 times stronger than the others and aimed at the wall. The finalfinal straw was a split in the seam holding the two main pieces together - now half the water shoots straight out the side, soaking whatever you have it pointed at. It's now completely unusable. Save your money, skip this one
customer_reviews.author: Addison Bye

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Middle nozzle shoot water out higher/more pressure than all others thus making this hard line of water that's really annoying and ruins the experience. Tried to move the nozzle around and it falls right into the body of the shower head, the next replacement nozzle went right in to. Another reviewer said it best, all the good reviews are probably done on the 1st day of ownership. Already have to deal with the annoyance of returning. Get something legit.
customer_reviews.author: Mico

customer_reviews.title: rain style shower head
customer_reviews.text: The shower head works great if you have enough water pressure. My husband has wanted a rain shower head for while and with this being so affordable I figured it was worth a try. Best option is to get a smaller O ring to place inside the threaded area of the shower head before placing on shower spout to create a stronger water spray.
customer_reviews.author: Magan

customer_reviews.title: I will never use a standard shower head again.
customer_reviews.text: I will never use a standard shower head again. I don't think I've ever had a shower head I'd label as satisfying until now. This thing is great. I did order and extender arm so the head would be positioned for the water to fall straight down but I was impatient as the head showed up first and I installed it as is. I am 6 feet tall and I didn't have any problems with the angel or whatever. I'd say you'd probably be okay without the extender arm but I'd still recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Great Shower Head!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this shower head today and it came in a very nice cloth ziplock bag to prevent any scratching during shipping. The nozzles on it are silicone and it even came with a few replacements as well. I also purchased The Delta Faucet UA902-PK Universal Showering Arm to attach it. Both items even came with teflon thread tape. After attaching both and lightly tightening with a wrench, I turned on the water and it works great!! This is a great product and I can't wait to enjoy it. Nice chrome finish on it and seems to be well made. Don't waste your money on those big money rain heads as this will do the trick just fine or even better!
customer_reviews.author: GordonB

customer_reviews.title: My guess is that any good reviews were made right after purchase
customer_reviews.text: My guess is that any good reviews were made right after purchase... as it is a great product for the money at first.. UNTIL... 6 months in the sid splits and water shoots out making it unusable... This is the 2nd one like it I have tried and Broke exactly 6- 8 month in same way. Piece of garbage, avoid unless your looking for a disposable product.
customer_reviews.author: brian touhy

customer_reviews.title: Not a long lasting product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this shower head in April of 2016. Yes its 2 yes old, however.. its completely shot. Sprays out water in 2 different directions from the area you adjust the height. (Depending on which way you angle it) It does use more water than the average shower head. It feels great while in use. Just didnt last as long as it should have. You get what you pay for folks.
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Fanciest shower head in the trailer park!
customer_reviews.text: The shower head truly has changed my life for the better. I was a bit confused at first because I though it was going to be the entire shower and surround, however it was not. It’s just the shower head. Excited to try it out once I get indoor plumbing and water into my trailer. I can’t tell you how exited I am about the idea of showering indoors, all of which has been made possible due to this life changing shower head!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmith350!

customer_reviews.title: Quite happy, can't beat the price
customer_reviews.text: Just installed it last night, so far so good. Easy to install, I did get an 11" extender bar and now wish I would've gotten a little longer bar. But feels great, steady stream. The middle nozzle does produce a heavier stream as previous reviews indicated, but unless my face is directly in the spray, it doesn't bother me. I was hesitant because the price seemed to good to be true, but i'm very happy with this product and the price. Doesn't seem that cheaply made, but also doesn't have the quality of a $500 one... but if course for the price i didn't expect it to be like a higher dollar one.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy salter

customer_reviews.title: Great value, very small issue with it.
customer_reviews.text: This shower head is great. It feels very luxurious, plenty of water comes through the jets, and overall quality is very good. The shower head does have a small leak between the point where it connects to the plumbing and the head itself. There is a ball / socket connection and water drips heavily through there. It is not an issue to worry about because it just ends up dripping down as part of the shower, and doesn't spray out. Also comes with teflon tape in the box, which is very convenient. I will be buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: John c

customer_reviews.title: I will recommend.
customer_reviews.text: The product came in a nice package and a little thank you note. It was easy to install and it also came with a free Teflon tape which was really helpful. It also came with replacement silicon "buttons". What I don't like about this product is that it is very light weight and would tilt when water starts flowing, I wish it was sturdier. Overall I am happy with my purchase and I would recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Gee

customer_reviews.title: The very middle nozzle is annoying because it sits right over the water input causing ...
customer_reviews.text: The very middle nozzle is annoying because it sits right over the water input causing it to have higher pressure and be "rouge" compared to the others. Also didn't quite fully seal even with a ton of teflon tape but works fine. I'd buy again for the money.
customer_reviews.author: B. Priest

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great shower head for the money. All metal construction and feels like a quality piece. Pressure is amazing but you'll drain your huge hot water tank in about 10 minutes since there's no flow regulator. I've found my drain can't keep up with the copious amount of water as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas N.

customer_reviews.title: It feels like you are in the rain
customer_reviews.text: It feels like you are in the rain. My only lamentation is that I got a bigger shower head (I got the 8"). It does not come with a wall extension, so you will want to get one as well. We purchased a 10" extension and that is kind of short and we may end up getting something that is longer.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: great shower head, definite buy.
customer_reviews.text: super luxurious and easy to install. install took 5 minutes and the showered is great. this is the best and the cheapest shower head I've found. it looks really nice, it Is easy on the wallet, and it is big allowing for lots of water flow. This is definitely worth the price. I will buy this again definitely.
customer_reviews.author: rockandroll

customer_reviews.title: It's nice if it's not faulty
customer_reviews.text: It's nice but one of the little holes where water comes out from has way more pressure than the other holes. Not sure if I have a faulty one but it's pretty annoying every time I shower
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. The unit looks just as nice as any other shower head I have ever dealt with. I paired it with the "Delta RP61273 Addison 16-Inch Shower Arm, Chrome" shower extension. This extension arm moves the center of the shower head 16 inches away from the shower wall. This way you can have the shower flow straight down. I'll be honest - I was a little apprehensive about buying a "cheap" shower head. But I've been using this for several weeks now and all is well. It comes with plumbers tape and some extra little spouts - so that's good in case you don't have the tape on hand. I'll update this review later if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Make It Rain
customer_reviews.text: YES. YES. YES. Inexpensive. Not ugly. Very functional. This showerhead has all of those features. It's in the main shower and I love it. You'll need to attach it to a shower arm that can hold some weight or it might drag the whole thing down...but for the money this is a marvelous purchase. You won't find anything better for this price.
customer_reviews.author: AwesomistReviews

customer_reviews.title: Bought 1, loved it, then bought #2 within a few days!  Now that's a testimonial.
customer_reviews.text: Since this was about $25, I figured it was a low risk item. It was. I installed it, which was super easy with a simple wrench, and the plumbing tape came included. Shoppers should know, the stream coming out of this is NOT pressurized. So it feels pretty good and all, but if you want to save a ton of water OR if you want fast rate, high pressure jet spraying on you, this is not the right product. And this thing does not save even a bit of water, FYI. That said, for "rain on your head" type showering, this thing is awesome. Thanks for reading.
customer_reviews.author: Arizona Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious
customer_reviews.text: Provides a really nice experience, giving you a really good soaking. I find it gives ample water pressure and a luxurious experience, because of the wide coverage, you can feel like you are fully in the shower and not getting cold on one side while the other side is getting warm water. The only downside is the middle stream of water is a bit more pressurized than the others, probably because it's right under the water inlet. But it's only barely noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Rhett S. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: While this product worked well when we first bought it ...
customer_reviews.text: While this product worked well when we first bought it, we began having problems with the nozzles and rusting within six months. Now that we are at the 10th month, the shower head has cracked along the edges and is no longer usable at all. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew McLeod

customer_reviews.title: It's very nice looking and sturdy, and has a nice pattern.
customer_reviews.text: Nice shower head. Adding this to our shower improved the user experience by 90-100%. Nice wide spread, included tape, extra filter, a few tips. Quality is perfect, no problems with any part of this unit. Installation was easy, just use tape, align threads, tighten.
customer_reviews.author: BubbaChive207

customer_reviews.title: water pressure is fantastic, easy installation
customer_reviews.text: water pressure is fantastic, easy installation. LOVE IT I did buy the "AKDY 11" Length Brass Adjustable Height Shower..." That was listed under the 'frequently bought together' which I definitely needed. If you want the real rain style shower then it should be directly above you!
customer_reviews.author: s.p.t

customer_reviews.title: Bought this a year ago this month
customer_reviews.text: And it is still going strong (Knock on wood). I have bought a few similar products and they all split at the seams after a few months. No this one!!
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo

customer_reviews.title: Great shower head
customer_reviews.text: Great shower head, the only thing i would say is add a reducer or valve before it due to this thing really pumping out a lot of water really fast. I added KES K1140B Shower Head Shut-Off Valve to help reduce the pressure and stop going thru my hot water. It great for the price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Orlando Muñiz

customer_reviews.title: Very soothing
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I enjoy the wide rain like fall. There is only one thing odd with it. The very middle nozzle that the water comes out off is oddly pressurized. It flows at a higher pressure than the rest. It may be my water pressure but I do not know. It is meerly odd and does not diminish my like of the product.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Feels and looks like moderate rainfall
customer_reviews.text: This shower head is reminiscent of being caught in a moderate rainstorm, minus the filthy rain stains you see proof of on white clothes prior to adding oxy clean to the laundry... My husband I both love the new shower set-up. It arrived quickly and was very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: DS3570

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. Stood the test of time.
customer_reviews.text: It’s held up for about a year so far. I love it so much one of my favorite purchases within the past couple years. It has one somewhat unimportant and nearly unnoticeable flaw in that the water pressure is significantly higher from the little nipple in the very center.. but that’s actually come in handy a few times so whatever.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew L.

customer_reviews.title: ahhh
customer_reviews.text: I've never used this style of shower head before and I'm not really sure what I was expecting...a gently, sprinkly spring rain, I guess? This thing puts out a pretty solid deluge, which is so much better than I'd hoped it would be. I probably don't want to know how much water I'm using now, but my daily shower is so much more luxurious.
customer_reviews.author: Pants

customer_reviews.title: Great head for cheap!!
customer_reviews.text: How bout that tag-line huh? Huh??? Haha. Shower head really is pretty awesome for the price! Doesn't need much pressure for good functionality and I often have to turn down the water pressure to mimic the "rainfall effect". FYI people, if you get a leaky connection use Teflon tape on the threads!
customer_reviews.author: Weiky

customer_reviews.title: I so love this
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be some kind of cheap acrylic plastic but it's metal, very shiny and looks sooooo luxurious like a shower in a presidential suite of some luxury hotel. I love it. Glams up my bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: LesHenrys H.

customer_reviews.title: I love this shower head
customer_reviews.text: Just installed this yesterday and it is awesome. Price was great, and it really does "drench" you. Glad I bought this. Haven't had it long enough to see if it will get plugged easily, but the tips are rubber so they're easily cleaned. It also comes with teflon tape and a few replacement tips.
customer_reviews.author: Quiksilver2101

customer_reviews.title: Dont't wast your money. very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for three weeks and then split open like a piece of junk. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: J. Parker

customer_reviews.title: It is working awesome. This is such a great deal
customer_reviews.text: It is working awesome. This is such a great deal. It's getting stained from the well water I'm hooked up to, but that's not a product flaw but a water quality issue. I will need to soak it in vinegar here shortly.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shower head!!
customer_reviews.text: The wife and I really like this shower head. It has a very nice flow of water not to mention, it's very beautiful!! Definitely recommend this. We use this in conjunction with a 10" adjustable shower arm.
customer_reviews.author: mikeg

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first rainfall shower head I've tried and I love it! I was afraid it wouldn't have enough water pressure, but it might have even more. It's fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: John Norton

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: Omg! Taking a shower now is an experience of itself, wow. It's like being gently woken up by a soft, Spring rain. I cannot be happier, especially because I got when it was on sale. I would pay even more money to have this, it's life changing. I never knew how much taking a shower suck before compared to this wonderful shower head. I'm starting to realize that it all depends on the shower head, and how the water hits your body. Highly recommended..
customer_reviews.author: Pretentious European

customer_reviews.title: Great shower head
customer_reviews.text: Great shower head. Only thing I don't like is the single hole in the center has slot more pressure than all the others so I move my face to the side when I rinse it.
customer_reviews.author: kpgile

customer_reviews.title: I love the look and feel of this show head
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and feel of this show head. For the price, it is definitely worth it! My one complaint is that it uses literally as much water as your spigot will produce (so much water that my drain can barely keep up). I'm considering buying a flow reducer so that it doesn't use so much water.
customer_reviews.author: BRAD F.

customer_reviews.title: Like standing in a warm rain shower
customer_reviews.text: It took me a while to find the right shower head, and this is it, The water pressure and amount is perfect, and it was easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bowers

customer_reviews.title: excellent design: elegant and practical at the same time
customer_reviews.text: excellent design: elegant and practical at the same time. if one were to save water, add a flow controller and you've got it made. my kids and we love the rainshowers.
customer_reviews.author: Practical Consumer

customer_reviews.title: ... do not review much but when something is really good or really bad you bet your butt i will
customer_reviews.text: I do not review much but when something is really good or really bad you bet your butt i will! I will say that for the price of this Shower head it doesn't get any better. I'm not here comparing it to a $300 dollar Stainless Steel head but for $20 bucks cant go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Very nice water flow
customer_reviews.text: Very nice water flow. I replaced an $80 model rain shower model that had grown less and less pleasing over the years. I couldn't be more pleased with this one. Excellent value, so far.....(only a month of use).
customer_reviews.author: juscoll

customer_reviews.title: So far works great.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Bit different the small shower heads I'm use too, but it met my mothers approval which to me is the most important thing. So far it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Dariusz Kowalewski

customer_reviews.title: Easy install but the distribution is off
customer_reviews.text: Easy install but the distribution is off, everything works like it should except ONE jet that is full force and painful. It’s right in the middle so you cannot avoid it. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Rkhale

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way
customer_reviews.text: We'd been searching for a quality shower head & many of them felt lightweight & cheaply made. Not this one! It was very easy to install and we've had no problems with leaks. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: tstep85

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great price
customer_reviews.text: This rainfall shower head is such a good buy for its price. Love it. The water flow and pressure is perfect feels serene and nice. Would recommend and do business again
customer_reviews.author: Krittika Kapani

customer_reviews.title: Conform to description - good water pressure / good waterfall effect!
customer_reviews.text: Does the job... Good water pressure (despite my shower having a sorta low water pressure - as many apartment in the city) and rainfall effect! Easy to install, does not leak so far!
customer_reviews.author: arno

customer_reviews.title: A shower head worth climbing the stairs for!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product that works. Easy to install - I recommend an extension arm and shower stool to sit while being rained on - I'm old & this thing makes shower time worth climbing the stairs !!
customer_reviews.author: dan troop/mariko troop

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Love this shower head I have two heads in my shower and they are great in my option not cheap plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great value and looks great! I installed this along with the Couer Designs S11" Extension Arm in an outdoors shower. It took me about five minutes to install both pieces and it adds a certain bit of elegance to our outdoor shower area.
customer_reviews.author: RPD

customer_reviews.title: Great flow and distribution.  Easy to install.  No problems so far.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Failed after one year. Began spraying out of the sides. Completely unusable. Great flow and distribution. Easy to install. No problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wise

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product looked great. Regretfully was larger than one I could use. My mistake in ordering the incorrect head size.
customer_reviews.author: H. Mody

customer_reviews.title: Very very cool
customer_reviews.text: Works well even by gravity ,installed on my 1966 -404 Mercedes-Benz Unimog for after surf showers
customer_reviews.author: Bartholomew Genovese

customer_reviews.title: ... one strong tiny stream in the middle that is annoying but other than that it is great
customer_reviews.text: Has one strong tiny stream in the middle that is annoying but other than that it is great. I've ordered two if that tells you anything.
customer_reviews.author: Travis James

customer_reviews.title: Recommend using an arm extension from the main inlet
customer_reviews.text: Soft, full flow of water . . . really the right amount without being comical in size. Recommend using an arm extension from the main inlet. Impressive design. Was a nice touch with a few spare nibs and plenty of teflon tape thrown in. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Mich Again

customer_reviews.title: This is the best shower head I've ever head
customer_reviews.text: This is the best shower head I've ever head. Combined with our great water pressure this distributes the water great. One thing that bothers me is the center part shower out slightly harder, we covered that part up.
customer_reviews.author: Dahlia

customer_reviews.title: ... time i have bought this product and it works great i recomend it
customer_reviews.text: 2nd time i have bought this product and it works great i recomend it.👍
customer_reviews.author: jorge puente

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best shower head I have ever owned, the mirror finish has my guests in wonder!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great Shower head
customer_reviews.text: Wow. My only reservation is that it's not a water saver. Great Shower head.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Vanmersbergen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great rain head for the money. Will buy another for the other bathroom. We bought the extender arm so the spray would be more in the middle of the shower as the item has s short arm. I would recommend buying the extender based on where you like to stand. I hate touching the sides, so this fixed that problem:)
customer_reviews.author: Drake

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, great pressure and nice finish!
customer_reviews.text: Great shower head. Installed it a week ago and everyone loves it! It has a nice finish decent pressure and easy to install. The size was exactly what we were looking for. 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Leo Mane

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but has one part with too much pressure.
customer_reviews.text: It works okay, but the middle has one hole that comes out super pressured that it even hurts my skin and it makes the whole *Rain* feeling go away... :( If it did not have that one bad spot it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shower head for cheap
customer_reviews.text: Great shower head. It is extremely thin and light weight as well as reflective! Great water pressure and was in perfect shape when it arrived. Only leaks from the connector when at a sharp angle which is expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: exactly what i ordered is what i got good quality actually yes i would order again
customer_reviews.text: arrived very quickly ! exactly what i ordered is what i got good quality actually yes i would order again
customer_reviews.author: SuzanneBradbury

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to beat the price/quality balance on this
customer_reviews.text: For the price I paid for this shower head, the fact that it works at all is simply amazing. So the fact that it looks good and works well is nigh unbelievable. I purchased this for 11 dollars on Amazon and my wife and I are both very satisfied--no defects I can point to.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander the Average

customer_reviews.title: Great looking product
customer_reviews.text: Great looking product. Easy to install with plumper tape. Awesome water fall feeling. Only con I can really think of is the practical application regarding temperature. It dispenses water quickly and a larger amount therefore your "hot" water gets used up quicker. Obviously not the product's fault, but hey it's something to note.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C. Parras

customer_reviews.title: Awesome inexpensive buy.
customer_reviews.text: Soo pleased with this purvhase, i have a small shower and the spray head i had was just horrible. Installed this along with a S bend neck and it is perfect . Sprays with a good heavy pour looks sharp its very thin profile and has a mirror finish. Ill post pics. Had it for 2-3weeks now and its been just fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: Mario A. Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: shower power
customer_reviews.text: Completely changes the shower experience. It's like it's raining on you instead of blasting you in the face. Looks to be a quality product to boot.
customer_reviews.author: robert b.

customer_reviews.title: Only had the installed a few days but love the product
customer_reviews.text: Only had the installed a few days but love the product. As others have said great product at an outstanding price. Highly recomended
customer_reviews.author: DLB-ATL

customer_reviews.title: Great product great price
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 3 of these and all of them work very well. Good quality. I actually took 2 of them and hooked them.together with a t to make one larger shower head. Kids like it so much they asked to have one put in other shower. Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: David Simon

customer_reviews.title: Good but not durable
customer_reviews.text: This showerhead worked great, but started rusting. I bought it in June of 2016. In July of 2017 it came apart and started spraying water in all directions.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory D. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Will be returning
customer_reviews.text: Middle nozzle shoots out like a rocket while all others come out smooth and gentle. Took the whole thing apart and there's no way to fix it. Also can't seem to find a way to contact the seller to troubleshoot. Will be returning this item. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse toppen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and stylish!
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful, stylish and best of all of stainless steel so it won't break like the plastic ones. Pressure is great.
customer_reviews.author: Jonseys

customer_reviews.title: I love it! It's so cheap but seems to be ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It's so cheap but seems to be excellent quality! I like it so much I ordered one for the other shower too!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Keiter

customer_reviews.title: This is a good quality shower head
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality shower head. Although I do not think this is worth 100 bucks, but 20 dollars would just do fine.
customer_reviews.author: S. Yoon

customer_reviews.title: feels like a rain shower.
customer_reviews.text: Feels just like a rain shower but you will need to buy an extension if you want the full effect to rain down on your head. Well built ,priced right.
customer_reviews.author: gldtobfl

customer_reviews.title: Works well, Great Price.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for a LONG time - Still going strong, works nicely and a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Panther

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice showerhead! I'm usually a skeptic about inexpensive products even when the reviews are positive but this definitely is nice! I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Cabot

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but lacks quality.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased several months ago and I must say I was disappointed. There was a huge leak at the ball joint that allows rotation. Found that I had to put in a certain position to stop from spraying everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shower head for the price. It also acts as a mirror which is useful when showering. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: SGTBROCK

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install! Product is very modern and adds value to the shower space. Would recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Buy one!!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best showerhead on the market. Super high quality for the money. If you don't already own one...buy one now!
customer_reviews.author: Kr

customer_reviews.title: Shot to the eye!
customer_reviews.text: Not a quality shower head. Nearly all nozzles flow like they should but there is one nozzle in the dead center of the shower head that shoots water at a pressure that makes taking a shower annoying. Had to return it
customer_reviews.author: Brian Danner

customer_reviews.title: Super great!
customer_reviews.text: I love my shower head! Super easy to attach and fits great in my standard sized shower! My only issue is the middle sprayer is more high pressured than the others so I have to be careful how high I turn the water on because it starts to hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, great price. We have hard water and this shower head has held up very well after several months
customer_reviews.author: josh peterson

customer_reviews.title: Houston Renovation of Modern Town Home
customer_reviews.text: This shower head is awesome. Good looking and gives a great spray..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stainless Steel?
customer_reviews.text: Price was right, but I guess I got what I paid for! Stainless Steel? Ha! Corroded and started to leak and squirt out in less than a year. Live and learn!
customer_reviews.author: Patt Alford

customer_reviews.title: I am so very happy I made this purchase
customer_reviews.text: It's raining!!! I am so very happy I made this purchase! Even I was able to install this showerhead and it's everything AND more!! I am loving my rain forest shower experience! This is a great purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sprout61

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't expecting that. This is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: No problems/leaks yet! Super high quality item, more than I was expecting for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Much better then the original
customer_reviews.text: This item works so much better then the one that came with. If I need another one I well defiantly reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Grumpy

customer_reviews.title: Showerhead
customer_reviews.text: Great value , it suprised me with replacement nozzles inlet screens and even the teflon tape for the threads .
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome and makes for a great shower
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome and makes for a great shower! Got it for a surprisingly good price and would recommend.

customer_reviews.title: nice looking rainfull shower head.
customer_reviews.text: Its look nice i like the design, but it make hazing or humming noise when you turn the shower at max..

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this shower head; wish I had it years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene L.

customer_reviews.title: Very good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Guests like the waterfall effect; it is a gravity feed and the pressure is sufficiently strong but will not pelt.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install but there is one nozzle right in ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install but there is one nozzle right in the middle that has more water pressure than all of the other nozzles.
customer_reviews.author: Bob B.

product_meta.title: BWE High Pressure Shower Head 8 inch Square Rainfall Shower Head 304 Stainless Steel with teflon tape Ultra Thin 1/2 Connection Bathroom Shower Heads High Polish Chrome
product_meta.description:
A New Day is Coming, Are You Ready for it 
Like many people, your new energetic day begins with an exciting morning shower. Wash away the sleepiness of last night to embrace a totally new day. Your spirit arise as the water flows over your skin, and you are becoming more and more attractive. Before the mirror, you look fresh. You are confident with the best look in front of people. A common extraordinary day starts. Each new dawn is a gift of God. You heart is bright and thankful. All the success and failure of yesterday, have gone with the flows of time. Here I stand, in this ever changing period, freely, serenely, faithfully. 
?Behind a joyful showering, BWE is dedicated to every details for you daily life. Every product launched by us is to help you enjoy more happiness of life, especially the freedom of shower. We adapt quality materials and strict manufacturing standards to produce high cost performance products for you. Hoped our product would bring you satisfied experience and would make your house more comfortable.
feature_bullets: HIGH PRESSURE SHOWER HEAD - The combination ultra thin and air-in technology leads to ultimate rainfall experience, Offering a good coverage to soak your entire body and give relaxing shower experience.
SQUARE SHOWER HEADS - Made entirely of stainless steel and no fragile plastic parts,Luxury modern chrome look, Universal wall mount install
SELF CLEANING NOZZLES-Flexible silicone jets prevent lime scale build-up for maintenance-free,resistant to clogging, easy to clean, anti-oxidation and corrosion resistant.
Swivel ball connector adjust and fix it to any angle you like, This shower tools will definitely offer a very comfortable shower experience for you.
EASY TO INSTALL - Working with standard 1/2'' pipe threads. Easy installation in wall-mounted shower arms without any tools in few minutes.Installation tools and arm not included
